description: This file defines a React functional component 'Logo' which renders animated SVG/Canvas graphics using the 'remotion' library. It includes schema validation with 'zod', imports custom components 'Arc' and 'Atom', and utilizes animation behaviors such as spring and interpolate to animate rotations and scaling.

methods.name: Logo
methods.description: React functional component that renders animated logo using 'remotion' hooks and components, with animated rotation and scaling based on current video frame.
